name: Escape the Witch
description:
Escape the Witch is my very first (and very tiny) game where you have to find and use objects in the scene to open the door and leave the house. 

I started learning Unity and C# a few months ago and wanted to see if I could start and finish a small project on my own. As I started it this October, I went for a Halloween themed escape game with very simple mechanics. It was a great learning experience and I hope to develop more small projects in the upcoming months!
